description: This CSS file defines the styles and CSS variables for managing light and dark themes in a React application, specifically for the App component, including responsive design for mobile.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application component styles including background color, text alignment, and media queries for animations.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application header including background color, flexbox layout, and text color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo including height and animation on non-reduced motion devices.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for application links including color transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button including positioning, colors, padding, and hover effects.
